data.expected_result: Message settings  screen would not come because you are in a different server
data.short_description: Message settings appears on when you go to profile select mutual servers and select one
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message in any channel - Click and hold the message  - When the scren comes, click on your name and it will go to your profile - Go to mutual servers and select one - The message settings screen will come.
